mapVisMarkerService
service in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Holds SVG marker paths for shared use between tags and map markers. Exposes basic functionality for rendering marker paths in SVGs outside of the map itself (filter tags).

Methods

  • renderMarkerToSvg(selector, idx)

    Render a marker path, by index to an SVG.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    selectorstring

    The d3/css selector that uniquely identifies the SVG to render the marker path to.

    idxint

    The marker index (0-2 otherwise the function does nothing).

Properties

  • paths

    Array containing SVG paths (strings) for the map vis markers.
